title: 被 403 Forbidden
author: heiniujun
txt_content:
我搜索整合包，找完后再搜索被403 ForbiddenYou don't have permission to access the URL on this server. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/search.php?searchsubmit=yesServer:tx-gz-mcbbs-prod-5Date:2020/02/19 16:53:38Powered by Tengine

我该怎么操作？

replies.author: 小庄c
replies.txt_content: 泥潭搜索被攻击了，请使用站外搜索或者等待= =

replies.author: 坑触可
replies.txt_content: 论坛被打，建议"site:mcbbs.net 搜索内容"

replies.author: 午申
replies.txt_content: 论坛被攻击，这段时间用百度吧。在搜索栏前面加上 site:mcbbs.net
